item.title: GOtchas Part 1
item.description: In order for me to build the habit of posting weekly content, hopefully every sunday, I would need to reduce the scope of what I will be sharing. Hopefully this reduction in scope will make me motivated habitually of post useful software engineering content. One of the common gotchas in GO relates to the use of slices. In gist a slice is a dynamically sized array. Within the concrete implementation of a slice are 3 fields:
